title: GPT-5 System Card
raw_excerpt: This GPT-5 system card explains how a unified model routing system powers fast and smart responses using gpt-5-main, gpt-5-thinking, and lightweight versions like gpt-5-thinking-nano, optimized for different tasks and developer use.
raw_body: This GPT-5 system card explains how a unified model routing system powers fast and smart responses using gpt-5-main, gpt-5-thinking, and lightweight versions like gpt-5-thinking-nano, optimized for different tasks and developer use.
speedrun: GPT-5 uses a unified model routing system for efficient responses.
why_it_matters: Improves response speed and accuracy for various tasks.
Supports developers with optimized model versions.

lenses.eli12: GPT-5 has different versions to help with tasks. It makes responses faster and smarter.
lenses.pm: Users include developers needing efficient AI solutions. The market benefits from optimized models, but competition and user adoption are risks.
lenses.engineer: The system uses a routing method to select models based on tasks. Data on performance is crucial, but specific metrics are not detailed.
